description: Digits of n^2 include digits of n as substring, n does not end in 0.
links: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..43 (terms < 4*10^9)
mathematica: Reap[For[n = 1, n < 10^8, n++, If[Mod[n, 10] != 0, If[StringPosition[ToString[n^2], ToString[n]] != {}, Print[n]; Sow[n]]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Apr 04 2013 *)
